diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Polymer Science.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    PolymerScience[Polymer Science] --> Synthesis[Polymer Synthesis]
    PolymerScience --> Structure[Polymer Structure]
    PolymerScience --> Properties[Polymer Properties]
    Synthesis --> Addition[Addition Polymerization]
    Synthesis --> Condensation[Condensation Polymerization]
    Structure --> Molecular[Molecular Structure]
    Structure --> Morphology[Morphology]
    Properties --> Mechanical[Mechanical Properties]
    Properties --> Thermal[Thermal Properties]
